headline: Big Day For Nucor After Q3 Earnings
summary: Nucor (NYSE: NUE) delivered a decisive earnings beat on Monday evening, posting Q3 results that significantly exceeded expectations and signaled the steel producer’s ability to navigate a normalizing industry cycle. The stock surged 2% in after-hours trading, reflecting market approval of both the headline numbers and the company’s strategic positioning heading into the final quarter. ... Big Day For Nucor After Q3 Earnings

headline: Nucor (NUE) Q3 Earnings: Taking a Look at Key Metrics Versus Estimates
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for Nucor (NUE) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended September 2025, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

headline: Nucor (NUE) Q3 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
summary: Nucor (NUE) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +22.33% and +4.39%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Nucor (NUE) Q3 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates

headline: Nucor Third-Quarter Profit Climbs on Higher Revenue
summary: Nucor recorded higher revenue and profits in the third quarter, but warned that earnings would fall sequentially in the current quarter as volumes drop in its steel mills business.

raw.headline: Nucor Third-Quarter Profit Climbs on Higher Revenue
raw.summary: Nucor recorded higher revenue and profits in the third quarter, but warned that earnings would fall sequentially in the current quarter as volumes drop in its steel mills business.

headline: Nucor: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) — Nucor Corp. NUE) on Monday reported third-quarter net income of $607 million. On a per-share basis, the Charlotte, North Carolina-based company said it had net income of $2.63.

raw.headline: Nucor: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) — Nucor Corp. NUE) on Monday reported third-quarter net income of $607 million. On a per-share basis, the Charlotte, North Carolina-based company said it had net income of $2.63.

headline: Nucor Reports Results for the Third Quarter of 2025
summary: Nucor Corporation (NYSE: NUE) today announced consolidated net earnings attributable to Nucor stockholders of $607 million, or $2.63 per diluted share, for the third quarter of 2025. By comparison, Nucor reported consolidated net earnings attributable to Nucor stockholders of $603 million, or $2.60 per diluted share, for the second quarter of 2025 and $250 million, or $1.05 per diluted share, for the third quarter of 2024.

headline: Pre-markets Pick Up Where They Left Off Last Week
